author: Special Correspondent
text:
The badly damaged car which was involved in the accident near Chathirakudi near Ramanathapuram on Monday.

A postgraduate engineering student and her mother, a government schoolteacher, were crushed to death and her father, also a schoolteacher, was injured when the car in which they were travelling collided head on with a tipper lorry at Chathirakudi near here on Monday.

Police said that the victims were returning from Madurai when Henry Bose Devadoss (54), zoology teacher at Schwartz Higher Secondary School, who was driving the car, tried to overtake a vehicle, lost control and collided with the lorry at Ottamadam around 7.40 a.m. H. Pushpalatha (51), science teacher at Valantharavai Government High School, died on the spot, while her daughter Anabella Monika (23), a final-year M.E. student of Syed Ammal Engineering College, died at the Government Hospital here.

Devadoss, a native of Reddiyapatti in Dindigul district, had gone to his native place on Friday evening with his family members to attend functions in Dindigul and Tiruchi. After his second daughter, a final-year B.E. student at Kalasalingam Institute of Technology, left for the college on Monday morning, Devadoss was returning to Ramanathapuram with his wife and Monika when the accident occurred.
title: Mother, daughter killed in accident
